content:
Our weekly podcast on the innovations, discoveries and gadgetry making the news

THE INSECT apocalypse may not be imminent, but the decline of INSECT species is still a concern, says our correspondent. Also, Dr Angela Gallop talks about her career as one of Britain’s most eminent forensic scientists. And when will a robot barista serve you a latte? Kenneth Cukier hosts. Runtime: 19 min. 

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify  | Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 疾驰；飞奔
vi. 飞驰；急速进行；急急忙忙地说
vt. 使飞跑；迅速运输
n. (Gallop)人名；(英)盖洛普
adj. 昆虫的；卑劣的
n. 昆虫
网络 虫子；昆虫系；昆虫类
eg2: insect species
昆虫种类
insect repellent(= a chemical that keeps insects away)
驱虫剂
an insect bite
昆虫咬伤

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
n. 世界毁灭；（《圣经》所述的）末世；大动乱；大灾变
网络 启示录；末日启示；世界末日
eg2: Civilization is on the brink of apocalypse.
文明已濒临毁灭的边缘。
an environmental apocalypse
环境大灾变

ex: n. 记者；通讯员；通信者
网络 通讯记者；驻外记者；常驻外埠记者
eg2: the BBC's political correspondent
英国广播公司的政治新闻记者
a foreign/war/sports, etc. correspondent
驻外、战地、体育等记者
our Delhi correspondent
我们驻德里的通讯员
She's a poor correspondent(= she does not write regularly) .
她是个懒于写信的人。

ex: adj. 杰出的；有名的；明显的

wp.eminent domain: 征收;征用权;		国家征用权;土地征用权

eg2: If Faust and Don Quixote are eminent creations of art, this is because of the immeasurable nobilities they point out to us with their earthly hands.
如果说浮士德和堂吉诃德是艺术创作的杰出代表，这是因为他们用尘世的双手向我们指出了无限崇高之处。
Of the Turners that got away, by far the most are to be found in the United States—and they are sometimes the only works by a British artist in  collections.
而那些已经遗失的泰纳作品，大多数将在美国被找到——而且这些作品时而会是一位英国艺术家的杰出作品中的唯一的一些作品。
Although Darwin was the son and grandson of physicians, the most eminent doctors of the day were flummoxed by his symptoms.
尽管达尔文的父亲和祖父都是医生，当时最杰出的医生们都对他的症状一筹莫展。

wp.forensic science: 司法科学;法庭科学;刑事技术;法医学
wp.Forensic expertise: 司法鉴定;违法;司法精神鉴定;法医学鉴定
wp.Forensic Psychology: 法医心理学;审判心理学;法律心理学;		司法心理学
wp.forensic toxicology: 法医毒理学;		法医毒物学
wp.forensic pathology: 法医学;		法医病理学;法医图片;法医病理
wp.forensic expert: 法医专家;法医;科学鉴定专家

ex: adj. 法院的；辩论的；适于法庭的
eg2: The lesson from such criticisms, I suppose, is that we should all turn ourselves into forensic accountants.
我想，这类批评的意思是，我们都应该把自己变成法律会计师。
SYDNEY:  scientists in the Netherlands have developed a reliable technique for estimating human age from just a single drop of blood.
悉尼：荷兰的法医学专家已经发明出一种可靠的技术，仅仅通过一滴血可以估计人类的年龄。
Charlier is an archaeologist and forensic pathologist at the University of Paris; the face in his hands may as well be contorted in a grimace.
查理尔是巴黎大学的考古学家和法医病理学家；现在在他手中的这块骨头形状扭曲就好像在做鬼脸。

ex: n. （统称）小器具
网络 小机件；小配件；小玩意儿
eg2: His desk is covered with electronic gadgetry.
他的书桌上摆满了各种电子玩意儿。

wp.Imminent attack: 敌人的进攻也越来越近
wp.imminent danger: 迫切危险;迫在眉睫的危险;急迫的危险;紧急危险

ex: adj. 即将来临的；迫近的
eg2: But still we have the character like Prince Hamlet, lacking iller instinct destroyed, by the imminent achievement of desires.
但我们仍有像哈姆雷特王子那样的人物，因缺乏“杀手的本能”，被欲望即将来临的实现而毁灭。
If change is  in your household, then try and follow these tips and lets see if we can make the change easier and better for all.
如果你家里这个转变即将来临，要试着遵循这些小技巧，然后看看我们是否能使这个转变变得更容易更好。
As the impact of the imminent Great Disruption hits us, he says, “our response will be proportionally dramatic, mobilizing as we do in war.
当即将来临的大崩解的冲击殃及我们时，他说：“我们的反应也将相应地巨大，如同我们在战争中做的那样动员起来。

ex: adj. 昆虫的；卑劣的
n. 昆虫
网络 虫子；昆虫系；昆虫类
eg2: insect species
昆虫种类
insect repellent(= a chemical that keeps insects away)
驱虫剂
an insect bite
昆虫咬伤

ex: n. 拿铁
网络 拿铁咖啡；牛奶咖啡；那堤

Title: How real is the insect apocalypse?

paperStatistics.title: How real is the insect apocalypse?
paperStatistics.desc: Our weekly podcast on the innovations, discoveries and gadgetry making the news
